channel.title: Veterans Day
channel.description:
Make sure to show respect to the people that serve the countries to protect the liberties of their people. Even if you don't agree with all of the wars, it's not them that chose which wars to fight!
Also, who do you have in the armed forces in your close family?
I have both of my grandparents (one of whom passed away about a year ago) who served in WWII, and an uncle that served in Vietnam.

item.title: Veterans Day
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:36, topic:467555”][quote author=Team_Rocket link=topic=584495.msg4157348#msg4157348 date=1352770579]

Ok. What did the combatants in Vietnam and Iraq do for us?

Mostly served in combat against their will so the rest of us wouldn’t have to. I agree that they were both pointless however.

It doesn’t make them heroes.

I disagree. Many of the Men and Women who served in our Armed Forces meet the criteria of “Hero”.
[/quote]
The one who says no to going to war, the one that says no to the wishes of the powerful ones, that one is a hero.[/quote]
Well said, although its not possible in times like these their is almost always another peaceful/less harmful way to resolve things.
People shouldn’t be proud of the military, people should be sad that their is a need for the military.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:

Mostly served in combat against their will so the rest of us wouldn’t have to. I agree that they were both pointless however.

It doesn’t make them heroes.[/quote]

I disagree. Many of the Men and Women who served in our Armed Forces meet the criteria of “Hero”.

item.title: Veterans Day
item.dc:creator: @Tree Tree
item.description:
@Tree wrote:

[quote=“Bowser jr, post:30, topic:467555”][quote author=Tree link=topic=584495.msg4157322#msg4157322 date=1352769859]

I wish you people would realize that this thread isn’t about your views on war and how it is, it’s remembering the people who fought in them. If you don’t loveing agree with it then piss the love off. This thread may merely be a post on the internet but it symbolizes something much larger and by god you better respect those men and women because without them we would be nothing.

I respect the veterans from the Napoleon wars, WWI and WWII. The true heroes.

I also respect Frodo and Sam for fighting so courageously against the orcs. A shout out to my homies, Luke Skywalker and Han Solo too. Stormtroopers ain’t shit.

In seriousness though, lots of respect for anyone who has served. No matter what your political views, they’re sacrificing a lot for us.
[/quote]
Ok. What did the combatants in Vietnam and Iraq do for us?[/quote]

#1: I’m not going to even bother going into this with you because we both know how many times this debate has been heard. It’s like Gangnam Style. It was interesting to hear the first few times but now you want to remove your ears with a toothpick every time it plays.

#2: Produced Cinema Gold
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=N3rBDe-17Ts[/youtube]

#3: Here’s a Lion… riding a horse. Crazy hey?

Read full topic

item.title: Veterans Day
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“Tree, post:23, topic:467555”]About time i get some recognition for being a veteran here. I’d like to say thanks for everyone who turned up to this thread. It’s been an amazing decade working with you all and getting to know all your faces.

Here’s to another 50 years together.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Veterans Day
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:20, topic:467555”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=584495.msg4156652#msg4156652 date=1352747647]
Make sure to show respect to the people that serve the countries to protect the liberties of their people. Even if you don’t agree with all of the wars, it’s not them that chose which wars to fight!
[/quote][/quote]not entirely true though

You aren’t forced to. Just don’t show up. What are they going to do? Dishonorably discharge you? THAT"S WHAT YOU WANT. At the most, you will go to prison for like a year until your contract is up. Hey guess what, that one year you could be using it to get a free education yay prison rocks!

= profit??

Read full topic
